messages.title: MAKING A DIFFERENCE IN KENSINGTON
messages.content: Upgrading local tube stations with step-free access, and improving air quality. Victoria saved North Kensington Library and North Kensington Police Station.

messages.title: STRONG AND STABLE LEADERSHIP IN THE NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: We need a General Election now because we have the opportunity to do what's right for Britain. We need the right leadership, the right plan and the right team to take Britain through Brexit and beyond.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring the right plan for Britain for Brexit, giving emphasis on strong and stable leadership through the upcoming negotiations.
Supporting housing provision for local key workers, boosting home ownership and building affordable homes.
More police and security, and counter-terrorism efforts to keep families safe.

issues.brexitEurope: Strong leadership in the Brexit negotiations.
issues.economy: Right plan for a strong economy.

housing.content: Supporting housing for local key workers, boosting home ownership, building affordable homes.

endorsements.endorsement: Victoria is exactly the type of strong leader we need during this period of opportunity.

images.caption: Victoria Borwick with residents and supporters during the campaign.
